The GME 338-10 Medical Gown is the de facto medical gown assigned to in-patients at hospitals and other care facilities across the Empire. This standard gown was designed so that patients could be dressed or undressed easily, and made with antibacterial fabric to help facilitate keeping wounds clean, lowering the risk of infection.
